attributes.action: Create a Fully Funded Government Body to investigate & successfully clone extinct species
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government should investigate and then clone species which have previously been extinct. This would enable the greater scientific world to study these animals, and dinosaurs, to ensure that the human race is not the next species to disappear from Earth.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
